1909 Obak Tennant.  Notch in left border.  Light wrinkle/crease at shoulder level (doesn't show on back).  Very light crease in uppermost right corner.  Framed back.  $85  (SOLD)

1909 Obak Harkins.  Poor condition.  Creases.  Surface Abrasions.  History of illicit drug use.  Shot a T205 just to watch it die.  Short tear at left edge just below raised elbow (more noticeable/pronounced on the back). $45 (SOLD)

Or $120 for the pair.
